name: yokatlas-mcp-typescript_health_check
description: Check the health and capabilities of the YOKATLAS server, including search method and data availability

name: yokatlas-mcp-typescript_get_associate_degree_atlas_details
description: Get comprehensive details for a specific associate degree program from YOKATLAS Atlas

yop_kodu.description: Program YÖP code (e.g., '120910060') - unique identifier for the associate degree program

name: yokatlas-mcp-typescript_get_bachelor_degree_atlas_details
description: Get comprehensive details for a specific bachelor's degree program from YOKATLAS Atlas

yop_kodu.description: Program YÖP code (e.g., '102210277') - unique identifier for the bachelor's degree program

name: yokatlas-mcp-typescript_search_bachelor_degree_programs
description: Search for bachelor's degree programs using LOCAL DATA with instant results, smart fuzzy matching, and bell curve sampling for large result sets

universite.description: University name(s) with fuzzy matching support. Can be a single string or array of strings (e.g., 'boğaziçi' or ['boğaziçi', 'odtü'] → matches any of the specified universities)

program.description: Program/department name(s) with partial matching. Can be a single string or array of strings (e.g., 'bilgisayar' or ['bilgisayar', 'yazılım'] → matches any of the specified programs)

sehir.description: City name(s) where the university is located. Can be a single string or array of strings (e.g., 'istanbul' or ['istanbul', 'ankara'] → matches any of the specified cities)

puan_turu.description: Score type: SAY (Science), EA (Equal Weight), SOZ (Verbal), DIL (Language)

universite_turu.description: University type: Devlet (State), Vakıf (Foundation), KKTC (TRNC), Yurt Dışı (International)

ucret.description: Fee status: Ücretsiz (Free), Ücretli (Paid), İÖ-Ücretli (Evening-Paid), Burslu (Scholarship), İndirimli (Discounted), AÖ-Ücretli (Open Education-Paid), UÖ-Ücretli (Distance Learning-Paid)

ogretim_turu.description: Education type: Örgün (Regular), İkinci (Evening), Açıköğretim (Open Education), Uzaktan (Distance Learning)

doluluk.description: Program availability: Doldu (Filled), Doldu# (Filled with conditions), Dolmadı (Not filled), Yeni (New program)

siralama.description: Target success ranking - applies bell curve sampling centered at this ranking. Programs closer to this ranking are more likely to be selected. Automatically filters to range [sıralama * 0.5, sıralama * 1.5]

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return. If more results are found, bell curve sampling is applied for representative distribution (default: 100)

name: yokatlas-mcp-typescript_search_associate_degree_programs
description: Search for associate degree (önlisans) programs using LOCAL DATA with instant results, smart fuzzy matching, and bell curve sampling for large result sets

university.description: University name(s) with fuzzy matching support. Can be a single string or array of strings (e.g., 'anadolu' or ['anadolu', 'istanbul'] → matches any of the specified universities)

program.description: Program name(s) with partial matching. Can be a single string or array of strings (e.g., 'turizm' or ['turizm', 'otel'] → matches any of the specified programs)

city.description: City name(s) where the university is located. Can be a single string or array of strings (e.g., 'istanbul' or ['istanbul', 'ankara'] → matches any of the specified cities)

university_type.description: University type: Devlet (State), Vakıf (Foundation), KKTC (TRNC), Yurt Dışı (International)

fee_type.description: Fee status: Ücretsiz (Free), Ücretli (Paid), İÖ-Ücretli (Evening-Paid), Burslu (Scholarship), İndirimli (Discounted), AÖ-Ücretli (Open Education-Paid), UÖ-Ücretli (Distance Learning-Paid)

education_type.description: Education type: Örgün (Regular), İkinci (Evening), Açıköğretim (Open Education), Uzaktan (Distance Learning)

availability.description: Program availability: Doldu (Filled), Doldu# (Filled with conditions), Dolmadı (Not filled), Yeni (New program)

siralama.description: Target success ranking - applies bell curve sampling centered at this ranking. Programs closer to this ranking are more likely to be selected. Automatically filters to range [sıralama * 0.5, sıralama * 1.5]. Associate degree programs use TYT-based rankings.

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return. If more results are found, bell curve sampling is applied for representative distribution (default: 100)
